name: Motorbike Fragments
des: A motorbike parts manufacturer's full-stack website.
overview: Users can delete their order, add reviews and pay for their orders.
Admin can manage products, make admin and manage orders.
Stripe payment system and jwt authorization activates on this site.

name: Electron Warehouse Management
des: A Warehouse Management System full-stack website.
overview: Users can deliver a product, add products and delete products.
Email-password and Google sign-in methods are implemented.
Some routes are private; only users can access those routes.

name: Sal Accounting
overview: Authentication system implemented on this site.
The checkout page is protected; only users can access this page.
Blogs and about sections added to this site.
